items.title: US seizes two 'shadow fleet' tankers linked to Venezuelan oil
items.title_zh: 美国扣押了两艘与委内瑞拉石油有关的"影子"油轮
items.summary: The United States says it has seized two tankers linked to Venezuelan oil exports in "back-to-back" operations in the North Atlantic and the Caribbean.
items.summary_zh: 美国说,它在北大西洋和加勒比地区的"接连"行动中缴获了两艘与委内瑞拉石油出口相关的油轮.

items.title: 米軍 ベネズエラ石油取り引き関連でロシア船籍タンカーを拿捕
items.title_zh: 美国陆军委内瑞拉石油公司的俄罗斯油轮
items.summary: 中国 “ベネズエラの原油 米に引き渡しは国際法違反”と非難
items.summary_zh: 中国“向大米运送原油违反国际法”

items.title: 米ミネソタ州 移民税関捜査局の職員が発砲 撃たれた女性死亡
items.title_zh: 明尼苏达州,美国海关移民局 调查人员枪杀女性
items.summary: 米軍 ベネズエラ石油取り引き関連でロシア船籍タンカーを拿捕
items.summary_zh: 美国陆军委内瑞拉石油公司的俄罗斯油轮

items.title: Tracking the oil tankers seized by the US
items.title_zh: 追踪被美国扣押的油轮
items.summary: BBC Verify has been tracking the Marinera for weeks. Merlyn Thomas has more.
items.summary_zh: BBC的核查 已经追踪Marinera数周了 梅林·托马斯还有更多

items.title: グリーンランドめぐり 米国務長官がデンマーク側と来週会談へ
items.title_zh: 格陵兰 美国访问丹麦国务秘书
items.summary: グリーンランドめぐり 米報道官 “軍も選択肢” 欧州はけん制
items.summary_zh: 格陵兰 Meguri 美国出版社“军事选择”欧洲肯尼迪

items.title: Thousands flee clashes between Syrian government and Kurdish fighters in Aleppo
items.title_zh: 数千人逃离叙利亚政府与阿勒颇库尔德战士之间的冲突
items.summary: At least 12 people have reportedly been killed during two days of intense clashes between Syrian government and Kurdish fighters in the northern city of Aleppo.
items.summary_zh: 据报道,在叙利亚政府与库尔德战士在阿勒颇北部城市发生的两天激烈冲突中,至少有12人被击毙.

items.title: 原子力規制委 浜岡原発の審査を当面停止 立ち入り検査の方針
items.title_zh: 哈马奥卡核电站检查暂停
items.summary: 「浜岡原発の審査すべて見直す必要」原子力規制委 山中委員長
items.summary_zh: "所有来自哈马冈原的考试 都需要查看" 核管制委员会主席Yamanaka

items.title: 偽造記念貨幣両替事件 容疑者ら偽名使い両替手続きか
items.title_zh: 伪造纪念币兑换案可疑和假名兑换程序?
items.summary: 偽造記念貨幣 両替した疑いで4人逮捕 組織的に繰り返したか
items.summary_zh: 伪造纪念币 4人被怀疑交换

items.title: 主食用米の生産量 新潟県や秋田県など 去年より抑える方針
items.title_zh: 主要膳食的稻米产量,如新加塔县和秋田县
items.summary: 2026年のコメ価格はどうなる
items.summary_zh: 2026年的价格是多少

items.title: Trump actively discussing potentially buying Greenland, White House says
items.title_zh: 特朗普积极讨论可能购买格陵兰,
items.summary: US President Donald Trump and his officials are "actively" discussing a potential offer to buy the Danish territory of Greenland, the White House has confirmed.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普和他的官员们正在"积极"地讨论购买丹麦格陵兰领土的潜在提议,白宫已经确认.

items.title: UN rights chief says Israeli policy in West Bank 'resembles apartheid system'
items.title_zh: 联合国权利主管说,以色列在西岸的政策“形成了种族隔离制度”。
items.summary: The UN human rights office has issued a report detailing what it calls Israel's "systemic discrimination" against Palestinians in the occupied West Bank, including East Jerusalem, and said the situation has "drastically deteriorated" over the past three years.
items.summary_zh: 联合国人权办公室发布了一份报告,详述了它所称的以色列对包括东耶路撒冷在内的巴勒斯坦被占领土上巴勒斯坦人的"系统性歧视",并说过去三年来局势"急剧恶化".

items.title: 車が警察官に突っ込みボンネットに乗せ約700メートル走行 大阪
items.title_zh: 车子冲向警察,开到大阪约700米
items.summary: 米軍 ベネズエラ石油取り引き関連でロシア船籍タンカーを拿捕
items.summary_zh: 美国陆军委内瑞拉石油公司的俄罗斯油轮

items.title: Cambodia extradites alleged scam mastermind to China after arrest
items.title_zh: 柬埔寨逮捕后将涉嫌骗局主谋引渡到中国
items.summary: Cambodia says it has extradited to China a billionaire businessman accused of masterminding a vast cryptocurrency scam in which trafficked workers were lured to forced labour camps to defraud victims globally.
items.summary_zh: 柬埔寨说,它向中国引渡了一个亿万富翁商人,被控策划了一场巨大的秘密货币骗局,其中被贩卖的工人被引诱到强迫劳动营去欺骗全球的受害者。

items.title: How could Donald Trump 'take' Greenland?
items.title_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普怎么会拿下格陵兰?
items.summary: Donald Trump wants to take Greenland - and the White House has confirmed that all options are on the table, including the use of force.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普想夺取格陵兰-白宫确认所有选项都摆在桌面上,包括使用武力.

items.title: Berlin power outage highlights German vulnerability to sabotage
items.title_zh: 柏林停电突出德国易受破坏
items.summary: Power is being restored to the last homes hit by a five-day blackout in Germany's snow-covered capital, Berlin.
items.summary_zh: 在德国被雪盖所覆盖的首都柏林,最后一天被停电的家园正在恢复电力.

items.title: Zelensky says he does not have clear security pledge from allies
items.title_zh: Zelensky说他没有从盟友那里得到明确的安全保证
items.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky says European allies have not given him sound guarantees that they will protect his country in the case of a new Russian aggression.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰总统沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基说,欧洲盟国没有向他提供可靠的保证,保证他们在俄罗斯进行新的侵略时会保护他的国家.

items.title: Watch: US seizes oil tanker in Caribbean sea
items.title_zh: 观察:美国在加勒比海扣押了油轮
items.summary: The US Coast Guard boarded two "ghost fleet" tanker ships in a "meticulously coordinated" operation, Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem said.
items.summary_zh: 美国海岸警卫队在"默默地协调"行动中登上了两艘"鬼船队"油轮,国土安全部长克丽丝蒂·诺埃姆说.

items.title: Venezuela's interim leader sacks general in charge of Maduro's guard
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉临时领导人解雇了负责马杜罗后卫的将军
items.summary: The general in command of Venezuela's presidential honour guard, Javier Marcano Tábata, has been sacked days after Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro was seized by US forces in a raid in Caracas and taken to New York to stand trial on narco-terrorism charges.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉领导人尼科拉斯·马杜罗在加拉加斯被美军突袭后被解职, 并被带到纽约接受毒品恐怖主义指控的审判。

items.title: Big freeze causes travel chaos across western Europe
items.title_zh: 大冻结造成整个西欧的旅行混乱
items.summary: A spell of freezing weather bringing heavy snowfall and ice has caused transport disruption across western Europe.
items.summary_zh: 冰雪和冰雪带来的冰冻天气 导致整个西欧的运输中断

items.title: Rare mountain gorilla twins born in Africa's oldest national park
items.title_zh: 稀有山地大猩猩双胞胎出生在非洲最古老的国家公园
items.summary: A pair of twin mountain gorillas has been born in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo - a rare occurrence for the endangered primates, conservationists at Virunga National Park say.
items.summary_zh: 刚果民主共和国东部出生了一对双山大猩猩——濒危灵长类的罕见现象,维龙加国家公园的保护学家说.

items.title: Nigeria's ex-justice minister granted bail in $6m corruption case
items.title_zh: 尼日利亚前司法部长批准保释600万美元腐败案
items.summary: A Nigerian court has granted bail to the country's former attorney general, Abubakar Malami, along with his wife and son, who are facing money laundering charges.
items.summary_zh: 尼日利亚一家法院已经批准保释该国前总检察长阿布巴卡尔·马拉米及其妻子和儿子,他们正面临洗钱指控。

items.title: 'Fear in the streets': Venezuelans uncertain about what might happen next
items.title_zh: "恐惧在街道上": 委内瑞拉人不确定接下来会发生什么
items.summary: In the days since the seizure of Nicolás Maduro, Venezuelans have been coming to terms with an uncertain future as a new reality begins to set in.
items.summary_zh: 在尼科拉斯·马杜罗被夺取之后的几天里,随着新现实的开始出现,委内瑞拉人已经对不确定的未来有了把握。

items.title: Yemen separatist leader accused of treason as Saudi Arabia strikes forces
items.title_zh: 也门分离主义领导人被控叛国 沙特阿拉伯打击部队
items.summary: The Saudi-backed presidential council in Yemen has expelled the leader of a separatist group and charged him with treason after he failed to fly to Riyadh for talks.
items.summary_zh: 由沙特支持的也门总统委员会驱逐了分裂主义集团的领导人,并在他未能飞往利雅得会谈后指控他叛国.

items.title: Plot to kill Burkina Faso leader foiled, says junta
items.title_zh: 军政府说,
items.summary: A plot to kill Burkina Faso's military leader, Capt Ibrahim Traoré, has been thwarted, the West African nation has announced.
items.summary_zh: 西非国家宣布,杀害布基纳法索军事领导人易卜拉欣·特拉奥雷上尉的阴谋已经失败。

items.title: Families shocked Swiss ski bar was not inspected for years before deadly fire
items.title_zh: 瑞士滑雪酒吧在大火来袭前 数年都没被检查过
items.summary: Families of the victims of a fire at a Swiss bar on New Year's Eve have expressed shock after officials admitted the venue had not undergone safety checks for five years.
items.summary_zh: 新年夜瑞士一家酒吧起火的遇难者家属表示震惊,因为官员在5年里没有接受安全检查。

items.title: Trump says Venezuela will be 'turning over' up to 50 million barrels of oil to US
items.title_zh: 特朗普说,委内瑞拉将"向美国"翻转高达5000万桶石油".
items.summary: Donald Trump has said Venezuela "will be turning over" up to 50 million barrels of oil to the US, after a military operation to remove President Nicolás Maduro from power.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普表示,委内瑞拉"将"向美国"交出高达5000万桶石油,此前曾采取军事行动将尼古拉斯·马杜罗总统赶下台.

items.title: Opposition leader Machado says her coalition should lead Venezuela
items.title_zh: 反对党领袖马查多说她的联盟应该领导委内瑞拉
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has said her coalition should "absolutely" be in charge of the country, following the US ousting of President Nicolás Maduro last week.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多(María Corina Machado)表示,在美国上周推翻尼科拉斯·马杜罗总统之后,她的联盟应该"绝对"掌管国家.

items.title: Trump's Venezuela raid has created chaos - and that is a risk for China
items.title_zh: 特朗普的委内瑞拉突袭制造了混乱——这是中国面临的一个风险.
items.summary: It took just a few hours for Donald Trump to upend a relationship that China had been cultivating for decades.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普花了几个小时才恢复了中国几十年来所培育的关系。

items.title: Japan nuclear agency worker loses phone with confidential data in China
items.title_zh: 日本核机构工人在中国失去保密数据的电话
items.summary: An employee at Japan's nuclear safety agency lost his work phone containing sensitive information during a personal trip to China, Japanese media report.
items.summary_zh: 日本核安全机构的一名雇员在个人出访中国期间丢失了包含敏感信息的手机,日本媒体报道.

items.title: An Indian state wants to tackle hate speech with a law - can it work?
items.title_zh: 一个印度州想用法律来对付仇恨言论,
items.summary: Can a law help curb hate speech in India? That's what the southern state of Karnataka is betting on.
items.summary_zh: 法律能帮助遏制印度的仇恨言论吗? 这就是卡纳塔克州南部的赌注

items.title: The painful questions for Nato and the EU as Trump threatens Greenland
items.title_zh: 纳托和欧盟因特朗普威胁格陵兰而感到痛苦的问题
items.summary: On Tuesday, the so-called Coalition of the Willing, largely made up of European leaders, met in Paris with envoys of US President Donald Trump, to try to make further progress on a sustainable peace deal for Ukraine.
items.summary_zh: 星期二,主要由欧洲领导人组成的所谓"意志联盟"在巴黎与美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的特使会面,试图在乌克兰的可持续和平协议上取得进一步进展.

items.title: Watch: Trump says Maduro copied his dancing. Did he?
items.title_zh: 央视:特朗普称马杜罗复制了自己的舞蹈. 是吗?
items.summary: In a speech to Republican members of Congress at the Kennedy Center, Trump claimed that former Venezuelan president Nicolas Maduro imitated his dance moves.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普在肯尼迪中心对共和党国会议员的演讲中称,委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗模仿了自己的舞蹈动作.

items.title: What's the relationship between Venezuela and Cuba?
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉与古巴的关系如何?.
items.summary: Cuba has held close relations with Nicolás Maduro's Venezuela. But with Maduro gone after a military operation in which he was seized, Havana could be exposed if oil supply collapses.
items.summary_zh: 古巴与尼古拉斯·马杜罗的委内瑞拉保持了密切关系. 但随着马杜罗在一次被扣押的军事行动后离去,如果石油供应崩溃,哈瓦那可能会被暴露.

items.title: 'It seems unjust to me' - views from Caracas on Maduro's seizure
items.title_zh: "这对我来说似乎是不公正的" - 加拉加斯对马杜罗的抓获的看法
items.summary: BBC Mundo has spoken to Venezuelans in the country's capital about the latest US military operation and Nicolas Maduro's seizure.
items.summary_zh: BBC Mundo向委内瑞拉首都的委内瑞拉人讲述了美国最近的军事行动和尼古拉斯·马杜罗被夺取的消息.

items.title: Does the US have the right to take over Greenland?
items.title_zh: 美国是否有权接管格陵兰?
